title: MediaMall PlayOn 3.7.27 + serial
description:
MediaMall PlayOn 3.7.27

Step 1:
Uninstall Internet Explorer 12 if installed(use IE11 or earlier) as it will cause problems with PlayDirect.

Step 2:
Block license checks by adding "127.0.0.1 data.playon.tv" to your hosts file.

Step 3:
Install the program with the included installer.

Step 4:
Register with the following
user
50F8-E762-ABB9-4BE3-C0A4-B23D-2F41-0CC7 OR D40B-9948-38CA-2D40-CB3E-607D-A03A-913A
(Both are Premium)


Don't expect Offical PlayOn channels to work anymore, stick with MyMedia and user-created scripts instead. If you need more, buy a license!


Notes:
-Mandatory license checks were added at version 3.8, do not try to update.
-Playlater is not included as it utilizes crypto properly in it's key algo
